mapper.select: select a.id,a.open_id,a.phone,a.vipcode,a.birthday,b.Integral,b.experience from users as a inner join user_account as b where a.id = #{id} and a.id=b.user_id
select a.id,a.pattern,a.target,a.remission,a.discount,a.start_time,a.end_time,b.status from discounts as a inner join user_discount as b where a.id=b.discount_id and b.user_id=#{id};
select id userId,open_id openId,phone,nickname from users where open_id =#{openid}
